---
title: "scout_vs_times_scouted"
format: html
---

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)

raw <- read.csv("data/test_data/data.csv")

plot_scouting_graph <- function() {
    scout <-raw$scout
    scout_count <- count(raw, scout, sort = TRUE)
    
    ggplot(raw, aes(x = reorder(scout, scout, length))) + 
    geom_bar() +
    theme_bw() +
    labs(
        x = "Scout Initials",
        y = "Number of Times Scouted",
        title = "Scout and Their Number of Times Scouted")
    
}

still_graph <- plot_scouting_graph()

interactive_plot <- ggplotly(still_graph)

interactive_plot
```
